mapper.select: /* [chn.bhmc.dms.sal.dsc.service.dao.JudgeStepFixDAO.selectJudgeStepFixsByCondition] */ SELECT A.CMM_CD AS WRK_DSTIN_CD , A.CMM_CD_NM AS WRK_DSTIN_NM , B.GRADE_CD , DECODE( NVL(B.GRADE_CD, 0) , 1, 'Y', 'N') AS ONE , DECODE( NVL(B.GRADE_CD, 0) , 2, 'Y', 'N') AS TWO , DECODE( NVL(B.GRADE_CD, 0) , 3, 'Y', 'N') AS THREE FROM ( SELECT A.CMM_CD , NVL(B.CMM_CD_TXT, A.CMM_CD_NM) AS CMM_CD_NM , A.SORT_ORDER -- 정렬순서 FROM CM_0303T A LEFT OUTER JOIN CM_0304T B ON A.CMM_GRP_CD = B.CMM_GRP_CD AND A.CMM_CD = B.CMM_CD AND B.LANG_CD = #{sLangCd} WHERE A.CMM_GRP_CD = 'SAL008' /*대상업무*/ and A.USE_YN = 'Y' ) A LEFT OUTER JOIN SA_0435T B ON A.CMM_CD = B.WRK_DSTIN_CD ORDER BY A.SORT_ORDER ASC
mapper.update: /* [chn.bhmc.dms.sal.dsc.service.dao.JudgeStepFixDAO.updateJudgeStepFix] */ UPDATE SA_0435T SET GRADE_CD = #{gradeCd} --등급코드 , UPDT_USR_ID = #{updtUsrId} --수정자ID , UPDT_DT = SYSDATE --수정일자 WHERE 1 = 1 AND WRK_DSTIN_CD = #{wrkDstinCd} --업무구분코드
